formations.name: The Eagles' Wings

tooltip.last_approved_text: A well-balanced formation, best used when you are fielding a large cavalry force to support both flanks.

formations.name: The Tiger's Left Claw

tooltip.last_approved_text: A formation with a strong, forward infantry core, best used when you have enough cavalry to support the left flank.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A formation with a strong forward infantry core, best used when you have enough cavalry to support the right flank.

formations.description: [PH] Carpenter's Square - Ranged First || Ranged at the front
formations.name: The Cautious Dragon

tooltip.last_approved_text: A well-balanced formation, best used when you are defending and are fielding a large cavalry force to support both flanks.
